H0.text: Who was the brother of the Bronte sisters. Byron

H1.text: Who was the brother of the Bronte sisters. Thackeray

H2.text: Who was the brother of the Bronte sisters. Dickens

H3.text: Who was the brother of the Bronte sisters. Branwell

A4.text: Patrick Branwell Brontë was the only son of Patrick Brontë and Maria Branwell Brontë.

A5.text: He was the only son of the Brontë family, and brother of the writers Charlotte, Emily, and Anne.
